english: I am pleased to meet you.
How long are you here for?
What is your … ? (email, phone number, address)
Here is my …. (email, phone number, address)

tamil: நீங்கள் Facebook அல்லது Twitter இல் இருக்கிறீர்களா?
translit: ninkal Facebook allatu Twitter il irukkirirkala?
english: Are you on Facebook or Twitter?
